description: Manage an Application Insights component or its subcomponents.

commands.name: az monitor app-insights component connect-function
commands.summary: Connect AI to an Azure function.
examples: az monitor app-insights component connect-function -g myRG -a myAI --function myFunction
az monitor app-insights component connect-function -g myRG -a myAI --function /subscriptions/mySub/resourceGroups/myRG/providers/Microsoft.Web/sites/myFunction

commands.name: az monitor app-insights component connect-webapp
commands.summary: Connect AI to a web app.
commands.syntax:
az monitor app-insights component connect-webapp --web-app
                                                 [--app]
                                                 [--enable-debugger {false, true}]
                                                 [--enable-profiler {false, true}]
                                                 [--ids]
                                                 [--resource-group]
                                                 [--subscription]
examples: az monitor app-insights component connect-webapp -g myRG -a myAI --web-app myApp --enable-profiler --enable-snapshot-debugger

az monitor app-insights component connect-webapp -g myRG -a myAI --web-app /subscriptions/mySub/resourceGroups/myRG/providers/Microsoft.Web/sites/myApp --enable-profiler --enable-snapshot-debugger false

commands.name: az monitor app-insights component create
commands.summary: Create a new Application Insights resource.
commands.syntax:
az monitor app-insights component create --app
                                         --location
                                         --resource-group
                                         [--application-type]
                                         [--ingestion-access {Disabled, Enabled}]
                                         [--kind]
                                         [--query-access {Disabled, Enabled}]
                                         [--retention-time]
                                         [--tags]
                                         [--workspace]
examples: az monitor app-insights component create --app demoApp --location westus2 --kind web -g demoRg --application-type web --retention-time 120

commands.name: az monitor app-insights component delete
commands.summary: Delete a new Application Insights resource.
examples: az monitor app-insights component delete --app demoApp -g demoRg

commands.name: az monitor app-insights component show
examples: az monitor app-insights component show --app demoApp -g demoRg
az monitor app-insights component show -g demoRg

commands.name: az monitor app-insights component update
commands.summary: Update properties on an existing Application Insights resource. The primary value which can be updated is kind, which customizes the UI experience.
commands.syntax:
az monitor app-insights component update [--app]
                                         [--ids]
                                         [--ingestion-access {Disabled, Enabled}]
                                         [--kind]
                                         [--query-access {Disabled, Enabled}]
                                         [--resource-group]
                                         [--retention-time]
                                         [--subscription]
                                         [--workspace]
examples: az monitor app-insights component update --app demoApp -k web -g demoRg --retention-time 120

commands.name: az monitor app-insights component update-tags
commands.summary: Update tags on an existing Application Insights resource.
examples: az monitor app-insights component update-tags --app demoApp --tags name=value -g demoRg
